concept.title: Random Port Number
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the to use a random port number. By default, the uses a static port number defined in the properties file.

conbody.p: HTTP protocolusing a random portrandom portusingConfigure the to use a random port when you want the operating system to supply a random port number or when you want to run the in cluster mode.

To determine the port number and URL to use to access the console, check the log. For example, the following message indicates that the is running on http://192.168.130.5:18630:2015-06-06 10:41:07,764 DEBUG WebServerTask - Running on URI 'http://192.168.130.5:18630/', HTTPS 'false'
The log is located in the following location:<SDCinstalldir>/log/sdc.log
